name: Superflight
description: Superflight is an intense, easy to learn wingsuit game with an infinite number of beautiful procedurally generated maps. A great game to relax for half an hour and chase your latest highscore!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 or higher Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: We don't think you need one. You can really just place a fan in front of you to simulate the wind-sounds.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Quadroople Core i1000 Memory: 11 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 12000 Storage: 200 MB available space
